Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P4 (Val-rich; natural AMPs; bacteriocin, bacteria, prokaryotes; UCLL1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (85.71%) toP3V: 36%, L=K: 21%. GRAVY: 1.26; M Wt: 1586.029; Mol formula: C77H137N17O17; Mol ex coeff: 1490.Activity: active against S. aureus TISTR 517 (MIC 8 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 142 (MIC 8 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 1096 (MIC 8 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 2468 (MIC 8 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Songnaka N, Lertcanawanichakul M, Hutapea AM, Krobthong S, Yingchutrakul Y, Atipairin A. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Purification and Characterization of Novel Anti-MRSA Peptides Produced by Brevibacillus sp. SPR-20.
